abstract: Will Citigroup turn loose its $100 million man, Andrew J. Hall? After putting out feelers to sell its Phibro commodities business, including a brief talk with the billionaire investor Warren E. Buffett, Citigroup is considering a variety of options.
snippet: Will Citigroup turn loose its $100 million man, Andrew J. Hall? After putting out feelers to sell its Phibro commodities business, including a brief talk with the billionaire investor Warren E. Buffett, Citigroup is considering a variety of option...
lead_paragraph: Will Citigroup turn loose its $100 million man, Andrew J. Hall? After putting out feelers to sell its Phibro commodities business, including a brief talk with the billionaire investor Warren E. Buffett, Citigroup is considering a variety of options, The New York Times’s Eric Dash reported.
